plot_functions.name: plot_functions
plot_functions.description: Create a Python script using Matplotlib to plot the given functions: (1) 'y = 3x^2 + 2x + 2', (2) 'y = -3x^2 + 2x + 2', and (3) 'x = 3y^2 + 2y + 2'. Save the plots as images for analysis.

open_plot_images.name: open_plot_images
open_plot_images.description: Open the plots as images for analysis.

interpret_shapes.name: interpret_shapes
interpret_shapes.description: Analyze the images on the screen from plotting the functions to interpret the shapes formed by these plots and spell out an acronym.

search_university.name: search_university
search_university.description: Use the '/tools/bing/searchv2' API to search for the flagship university using the acronym identified from the plots.

find_university_motto.name: find_university_motto
find_university_motto.description: Use the '/tools/bing/load_pagev2' API with a query parameter set to the name of the university found in the previous step to find the motto of the university.

report_motto.name: report_motto
report_motto.description: Report the motto of the flagship university identified from the search results.
